technologies.name: Froala Editor
technologies.description: Froala Editor is a WYSIWYG HTML Editor written in Javascript that enables rich text editing capabilities for applications.

technologies.name: Google Maps
technologies.description: Google Maps is a web mapping service. It offers satellite imagery, aerial photography, street maps, 360Â° interactive panoramic views of streets, real-time traffic conditions, and route planning for traveling by foot, car, bicycle and air, or public transportation.

technologies.name: Leaflet
technologies.description: Leaflet is the open-source JavaScript library for mobile-friendly interactive maps.

technologies.name: Bootstrap
technologies.description: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development. It contains CSS and JavaScript-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation, and other interface components.

technologies.name: Microsoft ASP.NET
technologies.description: ASP.NET is an open-source, server-side web-application framework designed for web development to produce dynamic web pages.

technologies.name: Amazon Web Services
technologies.description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a comprehensive cloud services platform offering compute power, database storage, content delivery and other functionality.

technologies.name: Font Awesome
technologies.description: Font Awesome is a font and icon toolkit based on CSS and Less.

technologies.name: Google Tag Manager
technologies.description: Google Tag Manager is a tag management system (TMS) that allows you to quickly and easily update measurement codes and related code fragments collectively known as tags on your website or mobile app.

technologies.name: cdnjs
technologies.description: cdnjs is a free distributed JS library delivery service.

technologies.name: Matomo Analytics
technologies.description: Matomo Analytics is a free and open-source web analytics application, that runs on a PHP/MySQL web-server.

technologies.name: lit-html
technologies.description: lit-html is a simple, modern, safe, small and fast HTML templating library for JavaScript.

technologies.name: lit-element
technologies.description: lit-element is a simple base class for creating web components that work in any web page with any framework. lit-element uses lit-html to render into shadow DOM, and adds API to manage properties and attributes.

technologies.name: Livefyre
technologies.description: Livefyre is a platform that integrates with the social web to boost social interaction.

technologies.name: jQuery
technologies.description: jQuery is a JavaScript library which is a free, open-source software designed to simplify HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation, as well as event handling, CSS animation, and Ajax.

technologies.name: Google Analytics
technologies.description: Google Analytics is a free web analytics service that tracks and reports website traffic.

technologies.name: Unpkg
technologies.description: Unpkg is a content delivery network for everything on npm.

technologies.name: HSTS
technologies.description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) informs browsers that the site should only be accessed using HTTPS.

technologies.name: Cloudflare
technologies.description: Cloudflare is a web-infrastructure and website-security company, providing content-delivery-network services, DDoS mitigation, Internet security, and distributed domain-name-server services.

technologies.name: Amazon SES
technologies.description: Amazon Simple Email Service (SES) is an email service that enables developers to send mail from within any application.

technologies.name: Open Graph
technologies.description: Open Graph is a protocol that is used to integrate any web page into the social graph.

technologies.name: HTTP/3
technologies.description: HTTP/3 is the third major version of the Hypertext Transfer Protocol used to exchange information on the World Wide Web.

technologies.name: DocuSign
technologies.description: DocuSign allows organisations to manage electronic agreements.
